original_text: When the Year of Jubilee for the Israelites comes, their inheritance will be added to that of the tribe into which they marry, and their property will be taken from the tribal inheritance of our ancestors.”
korean_text: 이스라엘 자손의 희년을 당하여 그 기업이 그가 속한 지파에 첨가될 것이라 그런즉 그들의 기업은 우리 조상 지파의 기업에서 아주 삭감되리이다

sentences.original_text: When the Year of Jubilee for the Israelites comes
to that of the tribe into which they marry
and their property will be taken
from the tribal inheritance of our ancestors
